chapters.title: Chapter 41: Among the Tuatha'an
chapters.info: Maedin Bashere, p. 680 (613)—Faile's brother. He is two years younger than she. When their father sent him to the Blightborder, it pushed Faile over the edge and she ran away to join the Great Hunt of the Horn. See also Bashere, Davram t'Ghaline; Bashere, Faile; Bashere, Zarine.
